sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect, setState } from "react";
import {
  Box,
  Select,
  Button,
  Text,
  CheckboxGroup,
  Checkbox,
  SimpleGrid,
} from "@chakra-ui/core";
import { HStack } from "@chakra-ui/react";
import { render } from "react-dom";
import { useSetRecoilState } from "recoil";
import "./OutcomeMapping.css";

const CourseOutcomeList = ({ course, numOfCheckmarks, department }) => {
  console.log(course);
  console.log(numOfCheckmarks);
  console.log(department);
  const courseOutcomes = course["course-outcomes"];
  console.log(courseOutcomes);
  let count = 0;

  const renderCourseOutcomes = courseOutcomes.map((outcome) => {
    return (
      <>
        <SimpleGrid columns={2} spacing={5}>
          <Box
            bg="white"
            height="80px"
            lineHeight="80px"
            textAlign="left"
            borderTopWidth="0px"
            borderLeftWidth="0px"
            borderRightWidth="0px"
            borderBottomWidth="2px"
            overflowWrap="break-word"
          >
            <Text
              color="#38a169b0"
              fontSize="14px"
              textAlign="left"
              fontWeight="bold"
              verticalAlign="middle"
              lineHeight="normal"
              display="inline-block"
              marginLeft="3em"
            >
              {++count}. {outcome}
            </Text>
          </Box>
          <Box
            bg="transparent"
            height="80px"
            lineHeight="80px"
            borderTopWidth="0px"
            borderLeftWidth="0px"
            borderRightWidth="0px"
            borderBottomWidth="2px"
            overflowWrap="break-word"
          >
            {numOfCheckmarks == "6" && (
              <HStack
                spacing={5}
                direction="row"
                alignContent="center"
                verticalAlign="middle"
                lineHeight="normal"
                display="inline-block"
              >
                <Checkbox
                  colorScheme="green"
                  value={[{ department }, { course }, { count }]}
                >
                  1
                </Checkbox>
                <Checkbox colorScheme="green" value={department}>
                  2
                </Checkbox>
                <Checkbox colorScheme="green" value="Option 3">
                  3
                </Checkbox>
                <Checkbox colorScheme="green" value="Option 4">
                  4
                </Checkbox>
                <Checkbox colorScheme="green" value="Option 5">
                  5
                </Checkbox>
                <Checkbox colorScheme="green" value="Option 6">
                  6
                </Checkbox>
              </HStack>
            )}
            {numOfCheckmarks == "7" && (
              <HStack
                spacing={5}
                direction="row"
                alignContent="center"
                verticalAlign="middle"
                lineHeight="normal"
                display="inline-block"
              >
                <Checkbox colorScheme="red" value="Option 1">
                  1
                </Checkbox>
                <Checkbox value="Option 2">2</Checkbox>
                <Checkbox value="Option 3">3</Checkbox>
                <Checkbox value="Option 4">4</Checkbox>
                <Checkbox value="Option 5">5</Checkbox>
                <Checkbox value="Option 6">6</Checkbox>
                <Checkbox value="Option 7">7</Checkbox>
              </HStack>
            )}
          </Box>
        </SimpleGrid>
      </>
    );
  });
  return <>{renderCourseOutcomes}</>;
};
export default CourseOutcomeList;
